Description:
Welcome to Pepperoni Pizza! A field shaped like a pizza and with Pepperonis everywhere in order to make your life harder.


Gameplay:
It's a standard-ish map so all you have to do is score in the goals. However the pepperonis launch you. Think of the pepperonis as a Trampoline, the faster you hit it, the higher and faster you'll go back in the opposite direction.


Mutators:
Boost: Unlimited

*You can add Boomer if you really want chaos



GLHF!
